name: Clown Factory: The Silly Purgatory
description:
23 year old Clementine wakes up in an abandoned hospital in Oregon,  filled with all sorts of weird things. While trying to explore it, she finds out that the hospital is actually a giant tower that distorts the higher it goes. But more importantly, the hospital has been repurposed into a factory for creating a bunch of crazy clown girls! With the help of some friends she meets in this labyrinth, Martha, Mitzi, Kit and Clementine all band together to escape this horrific place and uncover the truth of why they were there in the first place!

The itch.io download for this game also includes the OST for free, as an added bonus.
